text: "Darling! her voiced caressed him. "Moments like this make all the waiting worthwhile. When we're married we won't have these explosions of emotion, will we?" "No," he eyed her strangely. "I wish we were married, Di. Like a patient wishes operation, Nigel!".
handwritten_text: "Darling! her voiced caressed him. "Moments like this make all the waiting worthwhile. When we're married we won't have these explosions of emotion, will we?" "No," he eyed her strangely. "I wish we were married, Di. Like a patient wishes operation, Nigel!".
